title: Which one is best, Realme 7i or Realmi 6i? - Quora

response.answer_text: Actually this time Realme totally confused the buyers because Realme 7i doesn't look like a proper upgrade to Realme 6i, some specifications were downgraded from the previous generation. Realme 7i Display - downgradePerformance - downgradeCharging - downgradeRear camera - upgradeBattery life - upgradeYou can check out the full specifications of Realme 7i on Yantronic.

If you want good performance and average camera you prefer realme 6i If you want average performance and good camera you prefer realme 7i if you want for gaming you prefer 6i that is good mobile for gaming
